titleStmt.title: A brief letter from a young Oxonian to one of his late fellow-pupils upon the subject of magnetism
titleStmt.author: Wallis, John, 1616-1703.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for S. Keble at the sign of the Turks-Head in Fleet-street,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Exeter College Library, Oxford University.
